vlive.korean: 힘든 거 아니죠? It's not hard for you, is it? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.24 드립 : 세븐틴 갓 탤런트 #2 (Ad-lib : Seventeen's got Talent #2)
vlive.english: It's not hard for you, is it?

vlive.korean: 진짜 힘든 거 아닌가요? Are you sure it's not too hard for you? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.24 드립 : 세븐틴 갓 탤런트 #2 (Ad-lib : Seventeen's got Talent #2)
vlive.english: Are you sure it's not too hard for you?

vlive.korean: 찾아보니까 진짜 구하기 힘든 거더라? It's really difficult to get. 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 정신차려보니 나만 보는 잘생긴 또라이랑 썸 타는 중;; [인서울2] - 철또하림 모음.zip
힘든 거라고 하시지 않으셨나요? You said it's something hard to do? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.23 드립 : 세븐틴 갓 탤런트 #1 (Ad-lib : Seventeen's got Talent #1)
vlive.english: You said it's something hard to do?

vlive.korean: [우린 못할 것 같아...] - 다시 뿌려줘! - 너무 힘든 거 아니야, 이거? [I don't think we can do it...] - Shoot me again! - Isn't this too hard? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE REALITY “TIME TO TWICE” – 대탈출 EP.03
vlive.english: [I don't think we can do it...] - Shoot me again! - Isn't this too hard?

examples.korean: He was an exacting man to work for. 발음듣기 그는 밑에서 일하기가 힘든 남자였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was an exacting man to work for. 발음

examples.korean: The marathon is a severe test of stamina. 발음듣기 마라톤은 아주 힘든 체력 테스트이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The marathon is a severe test of stamina. 발음

examples.korean: Months of hard work culminated in success. 발음듣기 여러 달 동안 했던 힘든 일이 성공적으로 막을 내렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Months of hard work culminated in success. 발음

examples.korean: You have to persevere with difficult students. 발음듣기 힘든 학생들에 대해서는 인내심을 가져야 합니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You have to persevere with difficult students. 발음

examples.korean: After much hard bargaining we reached an agreement. 발음듣기 많은 힘든 협상 끝에 우리는 합의에 이르렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After much hard bargaining we reached an agreement. 발음
